import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' function Form() { const [data, setData] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:19006/form') .then(res => setData(res.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)); },[]) return (
{data.map((product, index)=>{ return })}
id Name price description image type
{product.id} {product.Name} {product.price} {product.description} {product.image} {product.type}
) } export default Form
